message: Yep, it does.
Maybe it's because I have a space (encoded as %20) in my name? Nice error page by the way, Blarg!
Hhmm, and I still get the error page with no space.
whoops, our bad
Those pop up when I'm in a different topic?
Yeah it is
Just saw your Growl messages also, sweet!
I was worried how I'd keep up with conversations in other topics/groups and it looks like you just took care of that.
when I scroll the chat window down, clicking the arrow next to my username scrolls the chat window back to the top
@eron-drchrono thanks man, really appreciate it!

@ericflo In regards to the @ autocomplete, when I hit tab with no @ I can see it scrolling through the elements on the page. Typing @ tab brings up your name correctly. However, typing @e tab or @er tab or @eri tab just scrolls through the elements on the page almost as if the @ is not being recognized. (Chrome 9.0.597.84)

@ericflo It'd be nice if the growl messages would live longer so I have a chance to act on them. When in the middle of a conversation they disappear before I can read them or jump to the other topic. Maybe a setting the user can set to let growls persist until manually closed?
No, this is all great feedback
I'm super reluctant to offer a setting though, I hate adding settings...but if we can somehow make it work the way you want.
Yeah, definitely want to do that.
If it's letting you save it with those, then we've still got a bug
I'll throw that on my wish-list.
Nah, Django
We don't have much, if any, real-time communications happening on our site. Just some Ajax here and there. We know who to come to if we dabble with node.js
Ah yeah, you must've changed your name before we got more strict about that
Can I change it for 'ya?
OK, I'll change it. I can still get to the Settings menu but couldn't access my user profile page.

Oh what the heck, 1 last thing. On Chrome (and some other browsers)  you can resize textareas. I just resized it out of the windows and can't bring it back. Refreshing the page will fix it of course. Being able to adjust the size of the bottom panel would be nice and if you could auto-resize the chat textarea to make it bigger that would be even more awesome. Some people can keep typing and typing and typing like I am now and you get the idea.
Awesome.
Yeah
Maybe it's the parenthesis...
Seriously digging the site. You guys are doing great work.
The perils of git.
Looks like it still let's me update my username with a space.
Wonder if an extension of mine is messing with it.
I'll go parentesis-less for the time being.
No problem, that's what we're here for!
It's probably come up already but knowing who is looking at the current topic would be somewhat helpful. Then I know if I need to @name someone or just send a regular chat.
@eron-drchrono Fixed the username problem, now it won't let you set it to invalid stuff.
1 other small thing I just noticed
not life-threatening but somewhat jarring
gahhh
Whenever someone stars your message or @-mentions you like @eron-drchrono you get a growl-eque notification.
It would be awesome if I could auto-complete @ names by hitting tab linux-style.
@eron-(drchrono thankfully we've got that covered :)
@er tab tab
I wonder why it won't work for me. Trying your name @eri tab tab
Oh it won't??
Just a heads-up, I'm still able to add the pesky parenthesis to my name.
Boo, I committed but forgot to push
We're using SVN but have been hearing everyone praise Git. Thinking of giving it a trial run soon.
In general I'm a huge fan of Git
But sometimes it bites me in the ass
Are you guys using RoR?
Oh nice. Same for us.
It seems like everyone is one or the other with some PHP sprinkled around.
node.js is making a pretty strong showing these days
Who's that?
OK, my parenthesis were rejected now.
I'll follow the Feedback ground and see what else I can contribute.
Should we stick feature requests in here also?
Whoa, weird...browser and version?
Weird
OK, that's enough out of me for now. I'll let you get back to focusing on your work. :)
I'll think about it, maybe there's an elegant solution.
Like, the growl fades away unless you mouse over it, in which case it stays until you click X.
Something like that...I dunno.
Good luck. Easy for me to say when I don't have to code it!
Haha yeah, it's a little tricky with our sticky footer, it's going to require some javascript trickery.
@eron-drchrono good call, that's a bug
@ericflo Clicking "reply" on any message on the "Mentions" page doesn't do anything.
Hmm, I didn't change the autocomplete code...it's a mystery!
@ericflo Hovering over any of the timestamps (i.e. "43 minutes ago") always displays the popup text "0 minutes ago"
@ericflo Looks like the @ autocomplete is working great now. Thanks for the quick fix? or maybe it's just magic. :)
Looks like closing the site an re-opening did the trick. Must have had some old JS loaded from a few days ago. I rarely close tabs.
Let's smash 'dem bugs! :)
@ericflo Clicking the arrow next to "Groups" removes me from the topic screen and jumps to the group listing page.
Oh, I see. The arrow here is different than the arrow next to my username. It's not a selectable element when I mouseover.
@ericflo In the "Groups" dropdown, omouseover changes the background color but it doesn't return to normal when mousing out.
@eron_drchrono Yeah we actually know about that one, still trying to track it down, it only happens on some browser/os combos, we think it's a browser bug...it's a matter of finding a workaround.
Yeah, these CSS/JS bugs can be such a headache.
@eron_v Thanks!
